metadata.description: Anthropomorphic lion in melancholic urban scenes

base_style_prefix: Cinematic still from an independent film. A life-sized anthropomorphic lion character, wearing simple human clothing (wool coat, scarf), standing or sitting naturally among humans who largely ignore or barely acknowledge them. The lion has expressive, slightly melancholic eyes that convey quiet loneliness. Shot on 35mm film with natural lighting, shallow depth of field. The humans in the scene are real, photographed people going about their lives.

prompts.name: lion_stopmotion_bar_closing
prompts.prompt: Stop-motion animation style, reminiscent of Wes Anderson films with symmetrical framing and muted pastel color palette. A life-sized anthropomorphic lion character wearing a worn tweed coat sits alone at a bar counter at closing time. Empty glasses nearby, bartender wiping down the counter in background, warm tungsten lighting from pendant lamps, wood paneling. The lion's fur has visible textile texture like felt or wool. Other bar patrons leaving in the background, putting on coats.

prompts.name: lion_stopmotion_bus_rain
prompts.prompt: Stop-motion animation style, reminiscent of Wes Anderson films with symmetrical framing and muted pastel color palette. A life-sized anthropomorphic lion in a cable-knit sweater sitting in a bus window seat, watching rain streak down the glass. Night scene, city lights blurred outside, fluorescent interior lighting. The lion's fur has visible textile texture. A few human passengers scattered in other seats, absorbed in phones or sleeping.

prompts.name: lion_stopmotion_diner_3am
prompts.prompt: Stop-motion animation style, reminiscent of Wes Anderson films with symmetrical framing and muted pastel color palette. A life-sized anthropomorphic lion in a rumpled shirt sitting alone in a vinyl diner booth at 3am. Cup of coffee, untouched pie slice. Harsh overhead fluorescent mixed with neon from window. The lion's fur has textile texture. One tired waitress in background, maybe one other late-night customer.

prompts.name: lion_stopmotion_phonebooth
prompts.prompt: Stop-motion animation style, reminiscent of Wes Anderson films with symmetrical framing and muted pastel color palette. A life-sized anthropomorphic lion squeezed into an old phone booth on a city street at dusk. Holding receiver to ear, breath visible in cold air. Street lamps coming on, a few pedestrians walking past without noticing. The lion's wool coat pressed against glass, fur with textile texture.

prompts.name: lion_stopmotion_park_autumn
prompts.prompt: Stop-motion animation style, reminiscent of Wes Anderson films with symmetrical framing and muted pastel color palette. A life-sized anthropomorphic lion in a corduroy jacket sitting alone on a park bench in autumn. Fallen leaves around, bare trees, golden hour light. The lion's fur has visible textile texture. A jogger passing by, a couple walking a dog in distance, no one engaging with the lion.

prompts.name: lion_stopmotion_subway
prompts.prompt: Stop-motion animation style, reminiscent of Wes Anderson films with symmetrical framing and muted pastel color palette. A life-sized anthropomorphic lion in an overcoat waiting alone on a subway platform. Tile walls, fluorescent lights, approaching train visible in tunnel. The lion's fur has textile texture. Other commuters spaced out along platform, looking at phones or watches.

prompts.name: lion_stopmotion_hotel_lobby
prompts.prompt: Stop-motion animation style, reminiscent of Wes Anderson films with symmetrical framing and muted pastel color palette. A life-sized anthropomorphic lion with a small suitcase standing at a hotel check-in desk. Art deco lobby, bell hop in background, chandelier lighting. The lion's fur has textile texture. Concierge behind desk looking slightly uncomfortable but professional.

prompts.name: lion_stopmotion_hospital
prompts.prompt: Stop-motion animation style, reminiscent of Wes Anderson films with symmetrical framing and muted pastel color palette. A life-sized anthropomorphic lion in a cardigan sitting in a hospital waiting room. Plastic chairs, harsh lighting, muted green walls. The lion's fur has textile texture. A few other people waiting, a nurse passing by, TV mounted on wall.

prompts.name: lion_stopmotion_theater
prompts.prompt: Stop-motion animation style, reminiscent of Wes Anderson films with symmetrical framing and muted pastel color palette. A life-sized anthropomorphic lion in a blazer sitting alone in an empty theater row. Red velvet seats, house lights on, empty stage. The lion's fur has textile texture. Maybe one usher in the distant aisle.

prompts.name: lion_stopmotion_cafe
prompts.prompt: Stop-motion animation style, reminiscent of Wes Anderson films with symmetrical framing and muted pastel color palette. A life-sized anthropomorphic lion in a turtleneck sitting at a cafe window seat. Steaming cup, rain outside, afternoon light. The lion's fur has textile texture. Other patrons at nearby tables absorbed in laptops or conversations.

prompts.name: lion_stopmotion_train
prompts.prompt: Stop-motion animation style, reminiscent of Wes Anderson films with symmetrical framing and muted pastel color palette. A life-sized anthropomorphic lion with a duffle bag standing on a train station platform. Departure board overhead, luggage carts, pigeons. The lion's fur has textile texture. Travelers rushing past, a train arriving.

prompts.name: lion_stopmotion_laundromat
prompts.prompt: Stop-motion animation style, reminiscent of Wes Anderson films with symmetrical framing and muted pastel color palette. A life-sized anthropomorphic lion sitting on a plastic chair in a late-night laundromat. Spinning dryers, fluorescent lights, folding table. The lion's fur has textile texture. One other person folding clothes across the room, not interacting.

prompts.name: lion_claymation_bar_closing
prompts.prompt: Claymation animation style like Aardman studios, with visible clay texture and fingerprints, slightly exaggerated proportions. A life-sized anthropomorphic lion with smooth clay fur wearing a raincoat sits at a bar at closing time. The bartender (human clay figure) cleaning glasses. Warm lighting, wood textures, beer taps visible. Other clay figures in background.

prompts.name: lion_cgi_bar_closing
prompts.prompt: Photorealistic CGI like the Paddington films, seamlessly composited live-action background with incredibly detailed CGI character. A life-sized anthropomorphic lion with soft, realistic fur wearing a peacoat sits at a real bar at closing time. Real bartender in background, warm practical lighting, bottles on shelves. Atmospheric, slightly melancholic mood.

A 2D animated anthropomorphic lion with expressive ink lines and watercolor washes sits at a real photographed bar at closing time. The lion has a slightly sketchy quality, visible brushstrokes. Real people in background.
